hibernate-mapping.query: select new LandDto ( l.Code, l.Description ) from LOMORM00005 as l where (l.Code =: code or l.Description =: description) and l.Active = true

select new LandDto ( l.Code, l.Description, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00005 as l where (l.Code =: code or l.Description =: description)
select new LandDto ( l.Code, l.Description, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00005 as l where l.Active = true
update LOMORM00005 as land set land.Description = :desp, land.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, land.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where land.Code=:code and land.Active = true
select new LandDto( l.Code, l.Description, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00005 as l where l.Code = :code and l.Active = true
